price: (Israel mma no) kaa sε: “Onyankopͻn so na yεde yεn ho atoͻ, Yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn, εmfa yεn nyε nsͻhwε mma nnipa bͻnefoͻ no;
arabic: فَقَالُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجۡعَلۡنَا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faqālū ʿalā al-lahi tawakkalnā rabbanā lā tajʿalnā fit'natan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
